item.title: Europeana Creative Design Challenge now open
item.description: Europeana Creative is pleased to announce its final challenge encouraging you to design and submit products, applications and designs that reuse Europeana content in the theme of Design.

item.title: New translation method in the Europeana API
item.description: We have recently released a new translation method in the Europeana API.

item.title: Europeana Labs update; take a Creative Challenge
item.description: Welcome to the 2nd Europeana Labs newsletter. Every few months we bring you the latest news from Europeana, focussed on showcasing the exciting opportunities available to our developer community and inspiring you to be creative with Europeâ€™s cultural heritage!

item.title: 2nd Europeana Creative Challenge Workshop, Barcelona, 16 July 2014
item.description: This blog post has been created to support the Europeana Creative Challenge workshop, Barcelona, 16 July 2014, held in association with Apps&Cultura. For those not able to attend, the event will be livestreamed at http://xmpp.iglor.es/appscultura_europeanalab/

item.title: Focus on re-usable datasets
item.description: In April we added over 1 million new items to Europeana. The majority of these new collections are openly licensed and re-usable.

item.title: Can I use it?
item.description: Uncovering the technology behind the simple search tool to discover reusable content available in both the Europeana portal and API.

item.title: Welcome to the new Europeana Labs
item.description: This new Europeana Labs website is intended to provide all you need to get started using the Europeana APIs. Learn about the data, see what others have created, and find out how to build simple but powerful queries to extract bespoke results from a dataset of over 30 million objects - books, photos of art and artefacts, audio clips and more.
